name: Number 54: Lion Heart
text:
3 Level 1 monsters
This Attack Position card cannot be destroyed by battle. If you take battle damage from battles involving this card: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the battle damage you took. Once per battle, during damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from that battle.
